column1: 243 ops were eligible to use tensor cores but none are using FP16

column1: The following GPU device IDs are not being used: 1 2 3
column2: Make sure to pass the necessary options to docker, the framework, and the model to use all available GPUs
Consider using NVIDIA DALI, a library that is a high performance alternative to built-in data loaders and data iterators. Learn more here: https://developer.nvidia.com/DALI

column1: Unable to split profile into training iterations: key op  not found

column1: PyTorch NVTX Context Manager was NOT detected.
column2: PyTorch NVTX Context Manager is required to associate GPU performance data to the correct forward and backward propagation phase. Please add torch.autograd.profiler.emit_nvtx() to the training/inference loop. Refer to the DLProf User Guide for more information.

column1: GPU Memory is underutilized: Only 67% of GPU Memory is used
column2: Try incrementally increasing batch size (by multiples of 8) to increase data throughput
